Hey Gwen! We're delighted to receive your review! It's fantastic to hear that you had a wonderful experience with us. Customer satisfaction is our top priority, and we're glad we met your expectations. Thank you for choosing us, and we can't wait to serve you again in the future.

Julie and Read Design does a wonderful job with Window Treatments.  She is professional, friendly, helpful and offers great products with exceptional customer service.
